name: A Coin is Really Just a Two Sided Die
name_original: A Coin is Really Just a Two Sided Die
description:
Controls

Use the left and right arrow keys to move. Dodge the cars to get a new top speed.

Game

A casual synthwave adventure. You are a coin (a two-sided die). 

Graphics

All graphics were made by me :) no outside help or tutorials. This took up most of the time which is why the gameplay is a little lackluster. Nonetheless I'm very proud of the 3D effect and how it turned out.

Credits

Everything: Me

Moral support: My awesome girlfriend <3

Feel free to leave a comment to compliment or critique.

Thanks for playing :)

Discord: cardy64#4627
